metadata.name: First gold foil peeling documentation on "OR" word
metadata.description:
If you purchase this moment, you actually purchase the moment where I documented the golden foil sheet peel from the first screen print I did on the series of "Ex Oriente Lux", a series of 20 prints hand made by myself and my studio. 

The word "Or" means "light" in Hebrew and is a reference to the Godly presence.

If succeed in purchasing this NFT, you will also be able to get the print in this series so you will have both the most crucial and exciting moment of the creative process and also the actual, physical final printed product. (please after buying is fulfilled send me via Instagram your details for shipment).

This print will be featured at OFFF Festival, September 2022.

for print details go to my website palmsandtigers.info

for more details and requests DM on Instagram.
